alert.note: Alert for Howard; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:11PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Sherman and west central Howard Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 511 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ashton, or 23 miles southeast of Ord, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elba and Farwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central Nebraska.
